Despite very large size staff very friendly and personable.
Expensive but spectacular.
There are many other good hotels in Singapore but it is worth it at least once for the experience.
Stayed in this hotel for 2 days.
Strategically located.
The hotel offers high standard of services, room and amenities.
Huge room.
Great view.
Staff are very well manner and trained.
Mall, casino, mrt and attractions are on your door step.
Definetelly will come back.
Love the place!
Stayed here for two nights as a surprise for part of my husband's 40th birthday trip.
The hotel is amazing from the minute you arrive and you definitely do not want to leave . . .
WE WILL BE BACK!!!
The hotel is huge and is one to be visited, I can't put the size of it into words.
Reception was very busy but moved quickly and you are offered drinks whilst waiting.
RJ Domingo checked us in and upgraded our rooms, lovely addition to the second part of our trip and we were extremely grateful.

sent_text: Our room was amazing and had incredible views.
One of the main reason to visit here was for the amazing pool.
The views were not to be missed.
You can only use it if you stay here, which is a good thing.
Even when it rained the pool was still in use and everyone was still happy and having fun.
